alert.note: Alert for Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 7:11PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Van Buren, east central Conway and northern Faulkner Counties through 745 PM CDT... At 711 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Mallet Town, or 16 miles north of Conway, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Greenbrier... Quitman... Guy... Damascus... Twin Groves... Mallet Town... Catholic Point... Woolly Hollow State Park... Fairbanks... Enders... Martinville... Center Ridge... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and north central Arkansas.

area.areaDesc: Conway; Faulkner; Southeast Van Buren County
